headline: Brown & Brown, Inc. announces 10% increase in quarterly cash dividend rate and authorization for up to $1.5 billion share buyback
summary: DAYTONA BEACH, Fla., Oct. 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brown & Brown, Inc. (NYSE: BRO) (the “Company”) today announced that the board of directors has declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.165 per share. The dividend is payable on November 12, 2025, to shareholders of record on November 5, 2025. The dividend represents a 10% increase from the previous regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.15 per share and is Brown & Brown’s 32nd consecutive annual dividend increase. The Company also t

headline: Curious about Brown & Brown (BRO) Q3 Performance? Explore Wall Street Estimates for Key Metrics
summary: Looking beyond Wall Street's top-and-bottom-line estimate forecasts for Brown & Brown (BRO), delve into some of its key metrics to gain a deeper insight into the company's potential performance for the quarter ended September 2025.
